title: Rivian, Tesla Stock Prices Jump in Premarket Trading
sub_head: Investors are piling into shares of electric-vehicle companies a day after Rivianâ€™s IPO
body:
Shares in electric-vehicle makers Tesla Inc. and Rivian Automotive Inc. rose in premarket trading Thursday, a day after Tesla Chief Executive Elon Musk disclosed details about his recent share sales.
Rivian, which rose 29% in its debut on the public markets Wednesday, jumped a further 5.5% ahead of the opening bell.
